title: Pin Component Definition
description: A pin-based WipperSnapper component for use in Adafruit IO

displayName.description: The human-friendly name of this component.

type.description: A unique string used to look up this component's definition.

i2cAddresses.description: List of I2C addresses (as hex string, like "0x38") this component can appear on.

subcomponents.description: List of sensors on this I2C component.
